value:
Oh, what an adorable insect!
I'll have to catch it and show
it off to $Nu...

In my homeland, I was in service to
House Virion, but, honestly, you can
just forget about my former liege.

It's kind of you to check on me, but
I'm sure you're busy. Stop by and
chat when you've got more time.

Say, would you like to go hunting with
Minerva and me sometime? It's so
cute when she eats a whole deer!

I've sewn up all the torn uniforms.
Let me know if you need help with
the stains on those white capes.

So, you there. You're the one called
$Nu, right?$k$pI've come to deliver a hello to you
from $Nf.

I feel invigorated! How about
you, Minerva?

See, Minerva? This is the
value of hard work.
Well, this is vexing.

I feel simply fantastic! Thank you
ever so much!

I'm Cherche, a wyvern rider from
Valm. My sweet Minerva and I
will join your cause.

Thank you for always supporting
me and my precious Minerva. We
both feel so safe with you!$k$pTo be honest, I was worried at first.
About living in a different world...
About fighting new enemies...$k$pI did leave home once before, but
coming here is not the same as
crossing from Valm to Ylisse.$k$pBut spending time with you—learning
about this world—has filled me with
determination to protect it.$k$pMy homeland of Rosanne is a green
and beautiful place, just like Askr.
I hope to show it to you someday.
はいっ
せやっ
きゃあっ
Oh my...
I bid you farewell.
Rest in pieces.
Snack time, Minerva!
You have made me angry.
Tragic...
Heehee
I love to sew and cook, so if you have need of such things, don't hesitate to ask.
If you have time, let's chat together awhile.
Some say I'm terrifying when angry, but that's simply not true.
I used to be a servant—now I ride a wyvern into battle. Life is strange, is it not?
Are there any really adorable monsters here? Like the Risen?
I wonder how things fare back in Rosanne...
No matter how dire the circumstance, you may rely on me and Minerva.
Quite so.
Shall we?
Minerva?
